name: The Perfect Day (Bingi, Pascal Bartholomäus, Kuzco333, Pascal Fulle)
name_original: The Perfect Day (Bingi, Pascal Bartholomäus, Kuzco333, Pascal Fulle)
description:
The Perfect Day is a small Hidden Picture game where you follow our protaganist along as he is getting ready to visit his mother in the hospital.

╔═══════════════════════════════╗

After a hard day of work, our protaganist gets a worrysome letter from his mother.

She asks him to come visit him in their local hospital, this obviously makes him worry, but hes keeping his cool.

He hasnt spoken to his mother in a while, he lives out in a small town and she in the main city. 

As we approche the hospital he gets more worried, drowing out all of his surroundings.

What could come next?...

╚═══════════════════════════════╝
